explains: n. （人的）后代，子女；（动物的）幼崽，崽兽；结果，产物

sentences.en: The offspring contain a mixture of the genetic blueprint of each parent.
sentences.cn: 后代体内含有父母亲基因图谱的混合。

sentences.en: Eleanor was now less anxious about her offspring than she had once been.
sentences.cn: 这时，埃莉诺已不像以前那样为子女担忧了。

sentences.en: The comet is going to come back in 2061 and we are all going to be able to see it. Well, our offspring are, anyway.
sentences.cn: 这颗彗星将于2061年返回，到时我们都可以看到它。哦，无论如何，我们子孙是可以看到的。
